meta.title: An Overview of the Taklung Kagyü Tradition

nodes.body: The Taklung Kagyü (stag lungs bka' brgyud) order was named after Taklung (stag lung) monastery founded in 1180 by Taklung Tangpa Trashipel (stag lung thang pa bkra shis dpal, 1142-1210).
nodes.title: An Overview of the Taklung Kagyü Tradition
